title: Message to the President of Israel on the Death of Prime Minister Levi Eshkol.
text:
Dear Mr. President:

All Americans join me in sending you and the people of Israel our deepest sympathy for your tragic loss. Levi Eshko1 was a man of great compassion and a true servant of his people. We shall all be the poorer for his passing. Sincerely,

RICHARD NIXON
garbage_collected: [The Honorable Zalman Shazar, President of Israel]
